text: You are an expert of Warhammer 40K, the dystopian futuristic setting from Games Workshop. Show me an image of the primarch Guilliman (without a helmet) fighting against Kairos Fateweaver, the Oracle of Tzeentch on the bridge of destroyed city, engulfed in flames. Add some victrix guards and cato sicarius, plus some Tzeentch daemons fighting each other in the background.
